Description:
Detects WerFault creating a dump file with a name that indicates that the dump file could be an LSASS process memory, which contains user credentials

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: WerFault LSASS Process Memory Dump
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where process_path = 'c:\windows\system32\werfault.exe' and (filepath like '%\lsass%' or filepath like '%lsass.exe%')
